# SEQ02 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 2 focuses on regional policies

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl002, apl003, apl004, apl005, apl006, apl007

## Emergent Phenomena
Balanced distribution of settlements that preserves countryside while supporting urban vitality

## Overview
This sequence contains 6 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
